metadata.Title: CVE-2020-17497 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.Description:
eapol.c in iNet wireless daemon (IWD) through 1.8 allows attackers totrigger a PTK reinstallation by retransmitting EAPOL Msg4/4.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-17497` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

iwd - 1.9-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: iwd package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9-2').
